Okay, so... I need a normal Bandori doujin...

see, at first I have nothing against trannies, but then I see the way  communities act.
Like 
"(anime character) says trans rights xddd" *insert art of fat trans uglified version of said anime character here*
"it's a site of cartoon porns from a country who doesn't give a damn about trans but there should be tag for trans", 
or even insulting japanese artists because their works don't suit your agendas.
It's as if by becoming a tranny itself turn you to an insufferable bitch.
Guess what? The world doesn't revolve around them. And it should not. Dial 8. also thanks for translating.

I mean, hurl whatever insults you wish at transgirls as much as you want. I'm not really stopping you from enjoying a good futanari yuri doujin, right? In fact, I'm enabling your enjoyment of it by translating it. you should at least show some gratefulness.
Getting real tired of this kind of shit tbh, I thought this site was safe from redditwitter wokes and trannies.

Translator here.
Out of all the yuri futa I've done, this one relates the most to trans-female themes, so I understand where the sentiment came from.
Note that genderbend is not the same as transgender. Genderbend has some element of magic or surrealness.
You could also argue that trans-female (the iffy hentai tag is "shemale") is a subset of futanari, tho not many people use that tag. Futa is a more popular catch-all tag.

poster.username: You are all gay, I know

body: @Sengachi nop. A Futa is a hermaphrodite, not a trans woman.
@Sengachi excuse me sir, this is nhentai
We need Ran Mitake yuri/futa :)

Futas aren't trans. Also genderbend tag already exists.
Go back to your circlejerk twittranny.

It'd be nice if we had a trans woman (and trans man too for that matter) tag instead of just the futanari tag.

Like, this is *very* explicitly a story about a trans woman, and it would be nice to be able to search for that.
yes one of my bang dream ship i love this
